text: The Chief Judge of the Tour de Yorkshire, Sheffield’s @marc_etches, says Sir Gary Verity has put cycling in Yorkshire onto the world stage - for his role in bringing Tour de France &  World Championships here. @BBCLookNorth
author: MarkAnsell

text: Team Sky becomes Team Ineos and its launch will be at Tour de Yorkshire. ⁦@BBCLookNorth⁩
author: MarkAnsell
